import { useLoaderData, Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Courts() { const courts = useLoaderData() return (

Tennis Courts

These tennis courts are public and provided by NYC parks. Submit your court if you don't see it here!
{courts.map((court) => ( ))}
Borough Name Location Phone Court Count Indoor/Outdoor Surface Accessible
{ court.borough } { court.fname } { court.lname } { court.location } { court.phone } { court.court_count } { court.indoor_outdoor } { court.surface } { court.accessible }
) } // data loader export const CourtsLoader = async () => { const res = await fetch('http://localhost:5000/courts/') return res.json() }
